job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtsumner ampamp scottampnbspare looking to recruit a number ofampnbspdata scientistsampnbspto join a fast growing fintech start up focussing on bringing down data barriersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtone of the most valuable kinds of data today is in the financial sector financial data plays a key role across many industry verticals however it has notoriously been locked behind regulatory barriers and a lack of format standards our clients first product is an api that makes financial transactions accessible with minimal engineering overhead to both humans and machinelearning models in a scalable and privacypreserving wayltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgttheyltpgtltpgtampnbsp are allergic to overengineeringltpgtltpgtampnbsp are anarchists at heart and like to hack around the status quoltpgtltpgtampnbsp are radically honest and appreciate challenging one another rather than giving out pats on the back ltpgtltpgtampnbsp are willing to learn and adapt quickly to new situations and requirements languages frameworks libraries compilers etc are just tools for a job a new problem might need a new tool if it doesnt exist yet we will build itltpgtltpgtampnbsp have a sense of humor well we think we doltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtas an early member of their data science team you will helpltpgtltpgtampnbsp push the limits of what can be done with dataltpgtltpgtampnbsp build the team and drive the direction of the companyltpgtltpgtampnbsp shape our product and cultureltpgtltpgtampnbsp experience the direct impact of what you build on hundreds of millions of peoples financial livesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthe following are requiredltpgtltpgtampnbsp the tools python pandas matplotlib scikitlearn etcltpgtltpgt spark sql and fundamental database operationsltpgtltpgtampnbsp recognized opensource contributions andor top performance in data competitions kaggle numerai etcltpgtltpgt fluency in statistics and probabilityltpgt
